name: Santa Hat [1]
description: Love happens in the snow season of RO, and the beautiful Christmas season. It's a memorial.

name: Santa Poring Skin
description: During Christmas, the Gingerbread City will provide fashion coloring materials to give Poring a Christmas vibe.

name: Saphien's Armor of Ocean
description: When you put it on, this armor wraps you tightly and makes you feel the cold breath.

name: Saphien's Armor of Ocean [1]
description: When you put it on, this armor wraps you tightly and makes you feel the cold breath.

name: Sapphire Mystery Bag
description: To honor the love and protection for the past 6 months. Open it to see what's inside!

name: Sashimi [1]
description: A slim blade very suitable for cutting sashimi. Fishes will have a sense of fear when they face this knife.
effect: Str ＋5,auto attack has a chance to deal multiple attribute Dmg to targets

name: Sashimi [2]
description: A slim blade very suitable for cutting sashimi. Fishes will have a sense of fear when they face this knife.
effect: Str ＋5,auto attack has a chance to deal multiple attribute Dmg to targets

name: Saurel Sword [2]
description: The scad sea-fish can be cooked in various tasty dishes. The texture is very hard because it's frozen.

name: Saurel Sword [3]
description: The scad sea-fish can be cooked in various tasty dishes. The texture is very hard because it's frozen.

name: Savage Babe Balloon
description: The cute balloons in the shape of Savage are welcomed by many adventurers.

name: Savage Babe Balloon Blueprint
description: The cute balloons in the shape of Savage are welcomed by many adventurers.

name: Savage Babe Picnic Pad
description: A picnic pad with the style and design of Savage Babe. You can feel the motherly love from it. (I MISS YOU)

name: Savage Babe's Gold Chest
description: To thank the adventurers for their care, Ivy took out her wooden box containing many interesting items.

name: Savage Babe's Hearth Report I
description: Medical report based on Ivy's physical condition: Day 1, Subject is healthy, but small in size and weak in strength.

name: Savage Babe's Hearth Report II
description: Medical report based on Ivy's physical condition: Day 2, Subject is growing stronger and size of body is growing slowly.

name: Savage Babe's Hearth Report III
description: Medical report based on Ivy's physical condition: Day 3, Subject is even more robust, with its strength growing rapidly.

name: Savage Babe's Hearth Report IV
description: Medical report based on Ivy's physical condition: Day 4, Subject is now tough as nails. It body size is now stabilized with its strength growing slowly.

name: Savage Babe's Hearth Report V
description: Medical report based on Ivy's physical condition: Day 5, Subject is healthy, it's body size growing exponentially and strength growing rapidly.
